description: A list of Heroes under assets/Common/SRPG/Person.

id_tag.description: Internal string identifier of the Hero.

roman.description: Identifier of the Hero used in certain file names (e.g. quote files).

face_name.description: Directory name for the Hero's sprites under assets/Common/Face and assets/Common/Unit.

legendary.description: Extra properties for Legendary / Mythic / Duo Heroes.

max_count.description: The maximum number of Dragonflowers that can be used on this Hero.

timestamp.description: The date-time since which the Hero is available for random unit generation (always available if this field is null).

id_num.description: Unique numeric index of the Hero. Third and last sort key when sorting Heroes by Origin.

sort_value.description: Second sort key when sorting Heroes by Origin.

origins.description: Bitvector representing all the series the Hero belongs to. Used by the filter tool and Limited Hero Battles.

weapon_type.description: Weapon type index of the Hero. Indexes assets/Common/SRPG/Weapon.json

tome_class.description: The tome element of the Hero. Only nonzero for units that belong to one of the magic weapon types. Purpose unknown.

move_type.description: Move type index of the Hero. Indexes assets/Common/SRPG/Move.json.

series.description: The game series from which the Hero originates. First sort key when sorting Heroes by Origin.

regular_hero.description: Whether the Hero is available for random unit generation.

permanent_hero.description: Whether the Hero cannot be sent home, used in Skill Inheritance, or converted into Combat Manuals.

base_vector_id.description: Random number used to produce different growth patterns.

refresher.description: Whether the Hero can learn a skill like Sing or Dance. At most one such Hero can be present in a brigade, even when a skill like Sing or Dance is not equipped.

growth_rates.description: Uncorrected growth rates at 3* in percentages.

skills.description: Lists of default and unlockable skills for every rarity.

items.description: List of default and unlockable skills for a given rarity. First 6 skills are default, the remaining 8 are unlockable.
